product_summary: Musico is an AI-driven software engine that generates music. It can react to gesture, movement, code or other sound. Musico's engines blend traditional and modern machine learning algorithms to generate endless streams of copyright-free music in a wide variety of styles.
product_pros: Generates infinite melodies, beats and harmonies
Blends autonomy and responsiveness to the creator’s input
Controls music generation with intuitive gestures in real time
Can react to a variety of control signals, opening the engine to endless possibilities of interaction
Develops a next generation soundtrack plugin for storytellers, game, and cross-media developers

product_usecases.details: Musico's engines can generate infinite melodies, beats and harmonies, blending autonomy and responsiveness to the creator’s input.
Apps like Impro allow musicians and performers to generate music in real time, controlling Musico with intuitive gestures.

product_usecases.usecase: Generative Scoring for Game and Media Development
product_usecases.details: The engines can be mapped and react in real time to a variety of control signals, opening the engine to endless possibilities of interaction.
Musico's technology can be used to teach music theory, composition, and performance.
Musico's generative music can be used to create relaxing or stimulating environments for music therapy.

product_toolfor.details: Musico's tools can help musicians and composers to create new music, experiment with different genres, and improve their skills.
Musico's engines can be used to generate music for film, television, video games, and other media.
Musico's technology can be used to teach music theory, composition, and performance.
Musico's generative music can be used to create relaxing or stimulating environments for music therapy.
Musico's user-friendly apps make it easy for anyone to create music, even if they don't have any musical training.

product_pricing: Musico's pricing depends on the product or service. The Engine is available for a monthly subscription fee, while the Apps are available for a one-time purchase.
